type.name: GetList
type.desc: Options to get a list of domains. https://www.namecheap.com/support/api/methods/domains/get-list.aspx
type.prop: The type of domains. Accepted values: `ALL`, `EXPIRING`, `EXPIRED`.
The keyword to look for in the domain list.
The number of domains to be listed on a page. Minimum value is 10, and maximum value is 100.
The field by which to sort domains. If not given, the domains are sorted in descending order by their creation date. One of: `name`, `expire`, create`.
Whether to sort in descending order.
